text: Among all of this season ’ s reboots, perhaps none engendered as much goodwill as the return of “ Queer Eye. ” The new Fab Five — Bobby Berk ( interior design ), Karamo Brown ( culture ), Tan France ( style ), Antoni Porowski ( food ), Jonathan Van Ness ( grooming ) — teamed up for a run of episodes that not only reflected their genuine camaraderie, but also brought a hefty dose of warmth, charm and authenticity to their makeovers. How did you approach the update of “ Queer Eye ”? Bobby Berk : One of the things we wanted to bring that the original show wasn ’ t able to was a look into our lives.
